content: the pattern the shadowplay cardigan is a super versatile knit coming together in the mix of several techniques using double knitting and half-brioche in two tones you create a double sided look &nbsp this pattern is available for free as it is still in its beta testing stage we would really love any feedback difficulty advanced &nbsp construction method the cardigan is worked top-down with raglan shaping beginning at the neckline a two-colour&nbsp double-knit neckband is worked first &nbsp short row raise the back neck for fit the yoke is worked flat in half brioche with increases on rs&nbsp row only sleeves are placed on hold at the underarm the body is continued flat and sleeves are&nbsp then worked in the round &nbsp the hem is finished with an integrated double-knit band the pattern is divided into sections and subsections to help you find your place easily materials &amp sizing the beta testing pattern comes in m more sizes will be added to the final pattern if you would like to test any of the other sizes please let us know via support@qing studio &nbsp needles 3 0 mm for neck band + cuff 4 5 mm circular needle 80 100 cm cable for yoke + body flat 4 5 mm circular needle / dpns for sleeves in the round notions 10 stitch markers we recommend using stitch markers you can number/tell apart easily scrap yarn / stitch holders only for sleeves and&nbsp provisional co
